snippet.title: "Fishing Paradise 3D" 2016 Trailer - UPDATED fishing game on Facebook, iOS & Android
snippet.description:
http://www.fishingparadise3d.com

Embark on a global fishing adventure with your guide "Captain Fish Hook" in the Ultimate cross platform fishing game. Play for FREE on iPhone, iPad, Android and Facebook. 

- PLAY FOR FREE
Download the game and play for free. Earn coins and xp to unlock items, features and new locations. Or purchase shiners and unlock them faster.

download from iTunes:
https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/fishing-paradise-3d/id595361386?

download from Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.promedia.fishingparadise

Play on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/fishingparadise3d

- BUILD YOUR DREAM FISHERY
Ever dream of owning your own lakes? Well now you can! Start with a plot of land and then turn your site into a Fishing Paradise! stock and breed your favorite species, invite friends, host tournaments and more.

- FISH EXOTIC LOCATIONS WORLDWIDE
Travel to 14 beautiful 3D rendered locations from around the world. Catch saltwater fish in Hawaii or hunt for the monsters of the Mekong river.

- 50 DIFFERENT SPECIES TO CATCH
From bass and pacu to stingray and giant catfish. Catch the widest variety of the rarest species ever seen in a fishing game. To catch them all you'll need both skill and a little luck. Hold on tight!

- MULTIPLAYER TOURNAMENTS
Compete with players from around the globe for prizes. With lots of different tournaments to enter, who will be No.1?

- REALISTIC FISHING ACTION
Working closely with a fishing legend has helped us create a game with unrivaled realism and action. Each fish has its own attributes such as strength and aggressiveness meaning no two fight is ever the same!

- HUGE SELECTION OF BAIT AND TACKLE
You'll not catch a monster with that old rod and reel, you'll need to upgrade your tackle if you want to land a lunker of a lifetime!

More Game Play Videos:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PY88ivvOn8U

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FrZTxWQa1Z8

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K3DUWmMxRoQ
